text: Disney Plus’ schedule for July 14 to July 20, 2025, includes America’s Funniest Home Videos Seasons 13-15, Disneyland Resort P.O.V. Walkthroughs, and Megastructures: Real Madrid Super Stadium. On July 17, America’s Funniest Home Videos Seasons 13-15 will premiere on the streaming platform. It will have a total of 67 episodes. The show features home videos sent by viewers involving comical situations, ranging from blunders to stage pranks. Further, the audience in the studio casts their votes for the funniest videos that end up receiving attractive prizes. Also coming out on Disney+ are Disneyland Resort P.O.V. Walkthroughs. Disney will be celebrating its theme park’s 70th anniversary in a special way. They will be releasing some special videos similar to the point-of-view experience of Rise Of The Resistance and Galaxy’s Edge that took place at Disneyland Resort in California. These special videos are a homage to Disney’s storytelling and authenticity in a cinematic experience like never before. Additionally, the documentary Megastructures: Real Madrid Super Stadium drops on the streaming platform. It unfolds the massive transformation of the stadium into a more technically advanced place. This includes a withdrawn roof, a 360-degree video scoreboard, and an underground pitch storage system. Additionally, the show will witness the advanced engineering and designs of the renovation and how the stadium will continue to host matches irrespective of the construction. New Disney Plus releases for July 14-20, 2025 Below are all the new TV shows and movies being added to Disney Plus from July 14-20, 2025. html:
Disney Plus’ schedule for July 14 to July 20, 2025, includes America’s Funniest Home Videos Seasons 13-15, Disneyland Resort P.O.V. Walkthroughs, and Megastructures: Real Madrid Super Stadium.

On July 17, America’s Funniest Home Videos Seasons 13-15 will premiere on the streaming platform. It will have a total of 67 episodes. The show features home videos sent by viewers involving comical situations, ranging from blunders to stage pranks. Further, the audience in the studio casts their votes for the funniest videos that end up receiving attractive prizes.

Also coming out on Disney+ are Disneyland Resort P.O.V. Walkthroughs. Disney will be celebrating its theme park’s 70th anniversary in a special way. They will be releasing some special videos similar to the point-of-view experience of Rise Of The Resistance and Galaxy’s Edge that took place at Disneyland Resort in California. These special videos are a homage to Disney’s storytelling and authenticity in a cinematic experience like never before.

Additionally, the documentary Megastructures: Real Madrid Super Stadium drops on the streaming platform. It unfolds the massive transformation of the stadium into a more technically advanced place. This includes a withdrawn roof, a 360-degree video scoreboard, and an underground pitch storage system. Additionally, the show will witness the advanced engineering and designs of the renovation and how the stadium will continue to host matches irrespective of the construction.

New Disney Plus releases for July 14-20, 2025

Below are all the new TV shows and movies being added to Disney Plus from July 14-20, 2025.

Thursday, July 17

  • America’s Funniest Home Videos (S13-15, 67 episodes)
  • Disneyland Resort P.O.V. Walkthroughs – Premiere (Below is the list)

Below is the list

  • Pirates of the Caribbean | Disneyland Resort
  • Indiana Jones Adventure | Disneyland Resort
  • Radiator Springs Racers | Disneyland Resort
  • Incredicoaster | Disneyland Resort
  • Haunted Mansion | Disneyland Resort
  • Tiana’s Bayou Adventure | Disneyland Resort
  • Cars Land | Disneyland Resort
  • Pixar Pal-A-Round | Disneyland Resort
  • Big Thunder Mountain Railroad | Disneyland Resort
  • Jungle Cruise | Disneyland Resort
  • Soarin’ Around the World | Disneyland Resort
  • Avengers Campus | Disneyland Resort
  • Hollywood Land | Disneyland Resort
  • Main Street, U.S.A. | Disneyland Resort
  • Mickey’s ToonTown | Disneyland Resort
  • 70th Celebration Nighttime Spectaculars | Disneyland Resort

Friday, July 18

  • Megastructures: Real Madrid Super Stadium

For more Disney content, check out the footage for its upcoming 2025 shows.
